thread.title: Ameesha Patel thrilled with new song for her first production 'Desi Magic'
thread.title_full: Ameesha Patel thrilled with new song for her first production 'Desi Magic' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ameesha Patel thrilled with new song for her first production 'Desi Magic'
text:
Ameesha Patel is in a happy space. The gorgeous actress was recently seen in a sexy avatar while filming a song for Desi Magic, produced by Kuunal Goomer and her under their banner, Ameesha Patel Productions. An elaborate set was constructed in a Mumbai studio to shoot the track .
READ: Ameesha Patel roots for 'Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai' sequel
Listen to songs of Shortcut Romeo on Gaana.com
Incidentally, Kuunal came up with the song's concept. When director Mehul Atha and the actress heard it, they fell in love with it. They are sure today's youth will love this number. It has been shot by a reputed production house that has several hit music videos to its credit, and features leading men Zayed Khan and Saahil Shroff, too.
Ameesha and her team are also planning a long schedule to a beautiful European destination this November for the movie. The actor-producer jests that the delay in completion is intentional. She explains, " Kuunal should be blamed for this. He believes that a film's delay doesn't matter. What is important is how the movie shapes up when it's ready for release. In the bargain, he took its scale to another level, both in terms of the look and budget. I'm super happy with the delay." They plan to release the film early next year.
